   :alt: License: AGPL-3

=======================================
Email Snippets Background Color Picker
=======================================

This module extends the functionality of the website mail designer to support
setting a custom background color to any snippet allowing you to customize it.

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

#. Install any module that makes use of the website mail designer, such as
   ``mass_mailing``.
#. Edit an email with the website mail designer.
#. Drag & drop any snippet into the mail body.
#. Click on *Customize > Pick Background Color*.
#. Pick any color, or enter its HTML code in the box. Press *Clear* to
   remove it.
#. Press OK.

.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/205/8.0

Known issues / Roadmap
======================

* Add the same functionality to all website snipppets. It would not be very
  hard, just another XML template.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues
<https://github.com/OCA/social/issues>`_. In case of trouble, please
check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first,
help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed `feedback
<https://github.com/OCA/
social/issues/new?body=module:%20
website_mail_snippet_bg_color%0Aversion:%20
8.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

info.summary: Set any background color for any mail editor snippet
info.html_description:
Email Snippets Background Color Picker

This module extends the functionality of the website mail designer to support setting a custom background color to any snippet allowing you to customize it.

Usage

To use this module, you need to:

  1. Install any module that makes use of the website mail designer, such as mass_mailing.
  2. Edit an email with the website mail designer.
  3. Drag & drop any snippet into the mail body.
  4. Click on Customize > Pick Background Color.
  5. Pick any color, or enter its HTML code in the box. Press Clear to remove it.
  6. Press OK.

Known issues / Roadmap

  • Add the same functionality to all website snipppets. It would not be very hard, just another XML template.

Bug Tracker

Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.
